Description:
Zorin OS - multi-functional operating system designed specifically for users of Windows, who want to try to switch to Linux. Zorin OS is based on Ubuntu, which is the most popular Linux operating system in the world.
In Zorin OS environment used GNOME Desktop Environment. The user interface is close to the distribution of Windows 7, and is included in the selection of programs , similar to the familiar Windows 7 users
